Package org.apache.axis2.testutils

Contains utility classes used by the unit tests in Axis2.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllTestsWithRuntimeIgnore
    Extension of the AllTests runner that recognizes RuntimeIgnoreException.
    JUnit38ClassRunnerWithRuntimeIgnore
    Extension of the JUnit38ClassRunner that recognizes RuntimeIgnoreException.
    PortAllocator  
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    RuntimeIgnoreException
    Indicates that a test case should be skipped.

Package org.apache.axis2.testutils Description

Contains utility classes used by the unit tests in Axis2.
